constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 212 (Wednesday, December 8, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. NORTON:
H.R. 6191.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
clause 18 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution.
[Page H7556]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.

title: To provide for interim appropriations for the District of Columbia courts and related agencies with respect to any fiscal year for which appropriations are not otherwise provided for such courts and agencies.
